data.title: Event : Series 2007A and the Issuer's School Facility Revenue Bonds Hearing Held May 4th, 2015 at 9:00a.m.
data.text:
NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING

PURSUANT TO NEW YORK GENERAL MUNICIPAL LAW §859-a

PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that the Erie County Industrial Development Agency will conduct a public hearing at the time and place described below with respect to the project described below and the proposal of said Agency to provide financial assistance relative to such project:

DATE: May 4, 2015

TIME: 9:00 a.m.

PLACE: Erie County Industrial Development Agency ("Issuer")

95 Perry Street, Suite 403

Buffalo New York 14203

DESCRIPTION OF PROJECT:

Issue one or more series of tax-exempt Refunding Revenue Bonds (the "Refunding Bonds")

in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $325,000,000 to provide funds to refund all

or a portion of the of the Issuer's School Facility Revenue Bonds (City School District of the

City of Buffalo Project), Series 2007A and the Issuer's School Facility Revenue Bonds (City

School District of the City of Buffalo Project), Series 2008A (collectively the "Prior Bonds")

and to pay issuance costs of the Refunding Bonds. The Prior Bonds were used for the

reconstruction of up to 80 school buildings located in the City School District of the City of

Buffalo.
